author: Simon Difford
description: Dry gin and dry aromatised wine enriched with the merest splash of apricot liqueur. (Originally made with Kina Lillet so this drink cocktail benefits from being made with a blend of kina-aromatised-wines.)
name: Eddie Brown
recipeIngredient: 25 ml Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
